Subject: A quick note for {{ friend_name }}

Subject: A small but real win

I noticed your progress on that thing—nicely done.

Subject: Big congrats

I’d love the story—what surprised you most?

Subject: Catching up with {{ friend_name }}

It’s been too long! I’d love to hear what’s new on your side—want to trade updates?

Subject: Cheering you on

Sending a quick note to say I believe in you, {{ friend_name }}.

Subject: Easy reschedule

Life happens—here are two new low-effort slots.

Subject: Follow-up from last time

Did that plan work out? I was rooting for you.

Subject: Great convo

I’ll send the link; pick one of these tiny slots?

Subject: I’m curious

What’s one thing you’re working toward right now?

Subject: Keep it tiny

We can do {{ est_minutes }} min this round.

Subject: Let’s mark the win

Quick coffee this week to celebrate?

Subject: Low-stakes coffee?

Two times that work for me—pick one?

Subject: Mini progress log

What moved forward this week?

Subject: One tiny favor

Could you glance at this and reply with A/B?

Subject: Quick walk & talk

15 min, public place; here are two options.

Subject: Thank you

Enjoyed that—would love a short follow-up next week.

Subject: This reminded me of you

Sending a smile and a link.

Subject: Your local wisdom

Any favorite coffee spot near ___?

nudges.text: Gentle nudge — if this week’s busy, want a {{ est_minutes }}-min hello instead?

I saw something that screamed {{ friend_name }} today and had to share

closers.text: Either way, it was good to think of you today.
I can draft the invite and you can hit send—sound good?
I’ll follow up in a couple of days if I don’t hear back—easy pace.
If now’s not great, we can shrink it to {{ est_minutes }} min.
Let me know what works for you and we’ll make it happen!
No rush—just happy to reconnect when you are.

Talk soon? I miss our chats.
